translations.pricing-page.description: Start for free and scale as you grow. No hidden fees, no surprises. Designed for African entrepreneurs with pricing that makes sense.
translations.pricing-page.compare.description: Detailed comparison of features across all plans
translations.pricing-page.whyIdem.title: Why IDEM Pricing is Different
translations.pricing-page.whyIdem.description: Designed specifically for African entrepreneurs and businesses. We understand the unique challenges and opportunities in African markets, and our pricing reflects that commitment.
translations.pricing-page.cheaper.description: Significantly more affordable than international alternatives
translations.pricing-page.mobileMoney.description: Pay with mobile money across Africa for easy access
translations.pricing-page.noHiddenFees.title: No Hidden Fees
translations.pricing-page.noHiddenFees.description: Transparent pricing with no surprise charges or hidden costs
translations.pricing-page.faq.description: Everything you need to know about IDEM pricing
translations.pricing-page.faq.question: {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.pricing-page.cta.description: Start with 10 free credits. No credit card required. Upgrade anytime.
translations.pricing-page.plans.free.name: Free
translations.pricing-page.plans.free.description: Perfect to explore IDEM and create your first project
translations.pricing-page.plans.starter.name: Starter
translations.pricing-page.plans.starter.description: Ideal for solo entrepreneurs and small projects
translations.pricing-page.plans.pro.name: Pro
translations.pricing-page.plans.enterprise.name: Enterprise
translations.pricing-page.plans.enterprise.descriptio: For large organizations with specific needs
translations.pricing-page.faq.a1: Credits are used to generate content with IDEM. Each action (logo generation, business plan, website, etc.) consumes a certain number of credits based on complexity.
translations.pricing-page.faq.q2: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
translations.pricing-page.faq.a2: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, and downgrades apply at the next billing cycle.
translations.pricing-page.faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
translations.pricing-page.faq.a3: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and mobile money for African users. Enterprise clients can also pay via bank transfer.
translations.pricing-page.faq.a4: Yes, we offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you are not satisfied, contact us for a full refund.
translations.pricing-page.faq.a5: Unused credits expire at the end of each billing cycle. However, Pro and Enterprise plans can purchase additional credit packs that never expire.
translations.pricing-page.faq.q6: Can I use IDEM for commercial projects?
translations.pricing-page.faq.a6: Absolutely! All plans, including the free tier, allow commercial use of generated content. You own everything you create.
translations.pricing-page.seo.title: Pricing Plans | IDEM - Affordable AI for African Entrepreneurs
translations.pricing-page.seo.description: IDEM pricing starts at $0 with 10 free credits. Starter plan at $15/month, Pro at $49/month. 60-80% cheaper than alternatives. Perfect for African entrepreneurs and businesses.
translations.pricing-page.seo.keywords: IDEM pricing, affordable AI, African pricing, AI platform cost, startup pricing, entrepreneur tools, cheap AI platform, AI credits, monthly subscription, free tier
